Module project.chenlin_17
Package project.chenlin_17.Views

Class GeneralBuilder

java.lang.Object
project.chenlin_17.Views.WorldBuilder
project.chenlin_17.Views.GeneralBuilder
public class GeneralBuilder extends WorldBuilder
This class is the builder using geometry class to build the scene.
Version:
Version1.0
update: December 29th
Author:
Lin CHEN - modified

    • buildWallGroups

      public void buildWallGroups(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle drawArea, int options)
      This function implements the abstract wall builder step in the parent class.
      It sets brick walls for all the levels, not just the level the player choose.
      Specified by:
      buildWallGroups in class WorldBuilder
      Parameters:
      drawArea - the area used for showing bricks
      options - player's choice for wall set choose

    • buildBall

      public void buildBall(BallModel model, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      This function implements the abstract ball builder step in the parent class.
      It sets the geometry ball view.
      The ball's speed is also initialized here.
      Specified by:
      buildBall in class WorldBuilder
      Parameters:
      model - initial model for ball
      color - the player chosen color

    • buildPaddle

      It sets the paddle color according to the player defined color.
      Specified by:
      buildPaddle in class WorldBuilder
      Parameters:
      model - paddle model
      color - the default paddle color for image paddle
      image - player chosen paddle image
      drawArea - paddle container to define the movement

      brickDimensionRatio - brick height/ brick width

    • makeBrickLevel

      public ArrayList<Brick> makeBrickLevel(int brickCount, int brickOnLine, javafx.geometry.Dimension2D brickSize, int typeA, int typeB, javafx.scene.Group group)
      This function helps build the wall level by level Modified: makeSingleLevel, makeChessLevel are combined to this function. There is no need for seperating single level
      Parameters:
      brickCount - total brick number
      brickOnLine - brick number per line
      brickSize - contains brick's width and height property
      typeA - expected brick type
      typeB - expected brick type
      group - expected viewing group
      Returns:
      walls with built bricks

    • makeBrick

      public Brick makeBrick(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, javafx.geometry.Dimension2D size, int type, javafx.scene.Group group)
      This function makes the brick view for the wall.
      If it is the first option, the geometry brick is built.
      Else the image brick is built.
      Parameters:
      point - brick center point
      size - brick height and brick width
      type - brick type
      group - expected viewing group
      Returns:
      built brick with defined center, height, width and type Modified:

      This helper function helps set all the brick image set according to the chosen wall set index.
      Parameters:
      options - player chosen wall set index
